mapper.sql: pbd.break_bulk_det_id, pbd.break_bulk_id, pbd.child_lot_no, pbd.break_bulk_qty, pbd.status, pbd.organization_id, pbd.create_time, pbd.create_user_id, pbd.modified_time, pbd.modified_user_id, pbd.is_delete, bt.color, spm.product_model_name, bt.material_quality, wo.route_id
mapper.select:
SELECT pbd.child_lot_no as 'batchNo',sm.material_code as 'materialCode',sm.material_name as 'materialName',sm.version,sm.material_desc as 'materialDesc',sr.route_id as 'routeId',sr.route_name as 'routeName',pb.process_id as 'processId',s.user_name as 'modifiedUserName',bt.color AS 'color', spm.product_model_name AS 'productModelName', bt.material_quality AS 'materialQuality ' FROM mes_pm_break_bulk_det pbd left join mes_pm_break_bulk pb on pbd.break_bulk_id = pb.break_bulk_id LEFT JOIN smt_work_order wo ON pb.work_order_id = wo.work_order_id LEFT join fantech_imes.smt_material sm on wo.material_id=sm.material_id LEFT JOIN base_tab bt on bt.material_id = sm.material_id left join smt_product_model spm on spm.product_model_id = bt.product_model_id LEFT join fantech_imes.smt_route sr on wo.route_id=sr.route_id LEFT join ocean.sys_user s on pbd.modified_user_id=s.user_id
and pbd.child_lot_no = #{batchNo}
